But what if I told you there was a way to not only feed your family, but to give your children a chance to contribute, to learn the value of hard work, and to build a better future for themselves?

There are opportunities in the city, good, honest work in the factories. Your children, with their youthful energy and nimble fingers, they can be a blessing to these factories. They'll learn a trade, earn a wage, and send money back home. Think of the difference it will make! 

You'll be able to buy better food, maybe even fix that leaky roof. Your children will be contributing to the family, learning valuable skills, and helping to lift us all out of this poverty.
